title: Spectacular Britain
creator_credit: Richard Brock and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: David Attenborough takes the viewer the length of Britain in one year. Some of its most beautiful countryside is shown as well as some fascinating wildlife. The gardens of Buckingham Palace are filmed for the first time.
